title: Leading mobile messengers in the U.S. 2019 , by users
yAxis: Number of monthly unique users in millions
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of monthly unique users in millions for 12 number of Platforms.
The Number of monthly unique users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Platform Facebook Messenger and lowest at Platform WeChat.
There is a difference of 104.92 between the maximum Platform Facebook Messenger and minimum Platform WeChat.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Number of monthly unique users in millions in the y axis.
The Number of monthly unique users in millions is highest at Platform Facebook Messenger and lowest at Platform WeChat.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of monthly unique users in millions for 12 number of Platforms.
The Number of monthly unique users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Platform Facebook Messenger and lowest at Platform WeChat.
There is a difference of 104.92 between the maximum Platform Facebook Messenger and minimum Platform WeChat.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of monthly unique users in millions for 12 number of Platforms.
Platform Facebook Messenger has the highest Number of monthly unique users in millions and WeChat has the lowest Number of monthly unique users in millions.
The highest Platform Facebook Messenger has 104.92 more Number of monthly unique users in millions than the lowest Platform WeChat.
Number of monthly unique users in millions at Platform Facebook Messenger is 106.4 , second place is Snapchat at 45.98, and thirdly is WhatsApp at 25.58.
Considered together, the average Number of monthly unique users in millions in all 12 Platforms is roughly 21.39.
Summing up the values of all Platforms, we get total 256.72.
